required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 09, 2023
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

brief_summary.textblock: This is a single arm study to evaluate the safety and biodistribution of 68Ga-labeled NY105 PET Imaging in patients

primary_outcome.description: Biodistribution of 68Ga-NY105 evaluated by radioactive uptake values (standardized uptake values, SUVs) in various organs during repeated 68Ga-PET scans will be reported.

intervention.description: Patients will receive a tracer (20-40mcg, IV) dose of 68Ga (2-5mCi) labelled NY105
